mapper.select: select c.f_fhbh,c.f_fhmc,date_format(d.f_cjsj,'%Y') f_cjsj,round(f_data,2) f_data from bes_household_data d left join bes_household_conf c on d.f_fhbh = c.f_fhbh where (c.F_PFHBH = '' or c.F_PFHBH is null) and d.f_type = 3 and date_format(d.f_cjsj,'%Y') = date_format(#{time},'%Y') and c.f_nybh = #{fNybh}

select c.f_fhbh,c.f_fhmc,date_format(d.f_cjsj,'%Y-%m') f_cjsj,round(f_data,2) f_data from bes_household_data d left join bes_household_conf c on d.f_fhbh = c.f_fhbh where (c.F_PFHBH = '' or c.F_PFHBH is null) and d.f_type = 2 and date_format(d.f_cjsj,'%Y-%m') = date_format(#{time},'%Y-%m') and c.f_nybh = #{fNybh}

select c.f_fhbh,c.f_fhmc,date_format(d.f_cjsj,'%Y-%m-%d') f_cjsj,round(f_data,2) f_data from bes_household_data d left join bes_household_conf c on d.f_fhbh = c.f_fhbh where (c.F_PFHBH = '' or c.F_PFHBH is null) and d.f_type = 1 and date_format(d.f_cjsj,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#{time},'%Y-%m-%d') and c.f_nybh = #{fNybh}

select c.f_fhbh,c.f_fhmc,date_format(d.f_cjsj,'%Y-%m') f_cjsj,round(f_data,2) f_data from bes_household_data d left join bes_household_conf c on d.f_fhbh = c.f_fhbh where (c.F_PFHBH = '' or c.F_PFHBH is null) and d.f_type = 2 and date_format(d.f_cjsj,'%Y') = date_format(#{time},'%Y') and c.f_nybh = #{fNybh}

select c.f_fhbh,c.f_fhmc,c.f_cjsj,ifnull(round(d.f_data,2),0) f_data from ( select c.f_fhbh,c.f_fhmc,t.f_cjsj from ( select date_format(date_sub(#{time},interval 1 month),'%Y-%m') f_cjsj union select date_format(#{time},'%Y-%m') f_cjsj ) t left join bes_household_conf c on 1 = 1 where (c.F_PFHBH = '' or c.F_PFHBH is null) and c.f_nybh = #{fNybh} ) c left join ( select d.f_fhbh,d.f_cjsj,d.f_data from bes_household_data d where d.f_type = 2 ) d on d.f_fhbh = c.f_fhbh and c.f_cjsj = date_format(d.f_cjsj,'%Y-%m')

select c.f_fhbh,c.f_fhmc,c.f_cjsj,ifnull(round(d.f_data,2),0) f_data from ( select c.f_fhbh,c.f_fhmc,t.f_cjsj from ( select date_format(date_sub(#{time}, interval 1 year),'%Y-%m') f_cjsj union select date_format(#{time},'%Y-%m') f_cjsj ) t left join bes_household_conf c on 1 = 1 where (c.F_PFHBH = '' or c.F_PFHBH is null) and c.f_nybh = #{fNybh} ) c left join ( select d.f_fhbh,d.f_cjsj,d.f_data from bes_household_data d where d.f_type = 2 ) d on d.f_fhbh = c.f_fhbh and c.f_cjsj = date_format(d.f_cjsj,'%Y-%m')

select c.f_fhbh,c.f_fhmc,date_format(d.f_cjsj,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') f_cjsj,round(f_data,2) f_data from bes_household_data d left join bes_household_conf c on d.f_fhbh = c.f_fhbh where (c.F_PFHBH = '' or c.F_PFHBH is null) and d.f_type = 0 and date_format(d.f_cjsj,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#{time},'%Y-%m-%d') and c.f_nybh = #{fNybh}

select c.f_fhbh,c.f_fhmc,date_format(d.f_cjsj,'%Y-%m-%d') f_cjsj,round(f_data,2) f_data from bes_household_data d left join bes_household_conf c on d.f_fhbh = c.f_fhbh where (c.F_PFHBH = '' or c.F_PFHBH is null) and d.f_type = 1 and date_format(d.f_cjsj,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_SUB(#{time},INTERVAL WEEKDAY(#{time}) day) and date_format(d.f_cjsj,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_ADD(#{time},INTERVAL 6 - WEEKDAY(#{time}) day) and c.f_nybh = #{fNybh}

select c.f_fhbh,c.f_fhmc,date_format(d.f_cjsj,'%Y-%m') f_cjsj,round(f_data,2) f_data from bes_household_data d inner join (select f_fhbh,f_fhmc,f_nybh from bes_household_conf where f_pfhbh in (select f_fhbh from bes_household_conf c where c.F_PFHBH = '' or c.F_PFHBH is null) ) c on d.f_fhbh = c.f_fhbh where d.f_type = 2 and date_format(d.f_cjsj,'%Y-%m') = date_format(#{time},'%Y-%m') and c.f_nybh = #{fNybh} order by f_data desc limit #{count}

SELECT c.f_zlbh,c.f_zlmc,date_format(d.f_cjsj,'%Y-%m-%d') f_cjsj,round(f_data,2) f_data FROM bes_branch_data d inner join (select f_zlbh,f_zlmc,f_nybh from bes_branch_conf where f_pzlbh in (select f_zlbh from bes_branch_conf where f_pzlbh is null or f_pzlbh = '') ) c on d.f_zlbh = c.f_zlbh where d.f_type = '1' and date_format(d.f_cjsj,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#{time},'%Y-%m-%d') and c.f_nybh = #{fNybh}
